data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Kevin Friend signals a throw-in for Brighton, close to Newcastle's area.
In the minute 2, Newcastle needs to be cautious. Brighton have an attacking throw-in.
Penalty! Kevin Friend points to the spot, great chance for Brighton...
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Neal Maupay.
In the minute 5, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Brighton take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Neal Maupay.
Leandro Trossard instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Kevin Friend awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Kevin Friend signals a Newcastle throw-in in Brighton's half.
At St James' Park, Jonjo Shelvey has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 13, Can Newcastle capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick Newcastle.
Throw-in Brighton.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 19, In Newcastle upon Tyne Brighton's Aaron Connolly is caught offside.
Newcastle drive upfield and Callum Wilson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Brighton defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Brighton to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Brighton attack through Yves Bissouma. The finish is off target, however.
Kevin Friend awards Newcastle a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Newcastle's Andy Carroll has run offside.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Newcastle have a dangerous throw-in.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Brighton!
Jamal Lewis (Newcastle) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 27, Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Brighton just outside Newcastle's area.
Throw-in for Brighton at St James' Park.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Brighton.
Kevin Friend waits before resuming play because Tariq Lamptey for Brighton is still down.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Brighton in the half of Newcastle.
Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Tariq Lamptey for Brighton is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Brighton at St James' Park.
In the minute 33, Ryan Fraser is replacing Allan Saint-Maximin for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jamaal Lascelles (Newcastle) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 36, Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Newcastle.
In the minute 39, Brighton's Leandro Trossard breaks free at St James' Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Miguel Almiron is replacing Andy Carroll for the home team.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 48, Can Newcastle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brighton's half?
Throw-in Newcastle.
Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 52, Kevin Friend awards the home team a throw-in.
Jonjo Shelvey for Newcastle gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 53, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 55, Jamaal Lascelles (Newcastle) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Brighton at St James' Park.
Leandro Trossard for Brighton drives towards goal at St James' Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Throw-in high up the field for Newcastle in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Dan Burn is on a sub for Tariq Lamptey for Brighton.
Free kick Brighton.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Neal Maupay of Brighton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 63, Callum Wilson's header is off-target for Newcastle.
Goal kick for Brighton at St James' Park.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Brighton.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Aaron Connolly for the away team is judged to be offside.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brighton's Leandro Trossard fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
The home team replace Jonjo Shelvey with Joelinton.
In the minute 73, Brighton's Aaron Connolly gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Kevin Friend awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 74, Can Brighton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
Newcastle's Isaac Hayden is back in action after a slight knock.
Isaac Hayden is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 77, Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Throw-in Newcastle.
In the minute 78, Brighton make their second substitution with Adam Lallana replacing Solly March.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Jeff Hendrick of Newcastle gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
Goal! Aaron Connolly extends Brighton's lead to 0-3.
Great play from Neal Maupay to set up the goal.
In the minute 86, Isaac Hayden (Newcastle) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match at St James' Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jamal Lewis, who is down injured.
In the minute 89, At St James' Park, Yves Bissouma is shown a red card and sent off.
Jamal Lewis is back on the pitch.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Alireza Jahanbakhsh (Brighton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Brighton's Neal Maupay gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
That's full-time at St James' Park. The final score is 0-3.
Alireza Jahanbakhsh is replacing Aaron Connolly for the away team.
